article_title: Pill, IUD or condom? What you should know
article_text:
Total Access

Enjoy the convenience of home delivery plus Digital D. Sign up for our BEST VALUE today!

article_metadata.description: When choosing birth control, more doctors are encouraging sexually active females to think outside the pillbox. Widely seen as a safe standby, the pill has long ranked as the most common contraceptive. But experts say it isn’t foolproof when users neglect to take it religiously at the same time each day.
